title: Disconnect Issues
body:
Hey Guys

Around 2 time per game of League I get disconnect and drop to my Windows screen to find that my internet has dropped out.
This never happens to me other than when playing League of Legends my Server Status I fine it just has a not saying my Server has no internet.

I have tried multiple places to play as I have a lap top and it seems when I play at a mates it does the same thing so it is my League version. I play other games and have no problems just League.

Any ideas?

replies.body:
This issue often happens when your connection to the servers is unstable, or if you disconnection from the platform service entirely (League client). There are certainly a lot of potential causes for this, however, the guide that *Rineyy* linked is a good place to start in troubleshooting this. 

If you still see issues after taking the steps from that guide, please let me know.
